record.field: POS Set Bottle Line Cron Job

env.cr.execute(""" SELECT distinct(order_id) as order_id FROM pos_order_line WHERE is_scent = 't' AND ( bottle_line_id IS NULL OR bottle_line_idx IS NULL ) AND to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') between ('2023-06-16') and ('2023-06-16') LIMIT 1000 """) query_results = env.cr.dictfetchall() order_ids = [res.get('order_id') for res in query_results if res.get('order_id', False)]
